title: Child's play: window on development
creator_credit: Vision Associates and Harcourt Brace Jovanovich
brief_description: Shows four types of play, including social, dramatic, sensory, and skill mastery, and levels of attainment from infancy through adolescence. Narrated by Sandra Scarr-Salapatek.
description: Shows four types of play, including social, dramatic, sensory, and skill mastery, and levels of attainment from infancy through adolescence. Narrated by Sandra Scarr-Salapatek.
